summary: A collection of general-purpose helper utilities for the NeMo text‑to‑speech (TTS) pipeline, including functions for data shaping, batch handling, audio and spectrogram visualization, logging to TensorBoard/WandB, gradient clipping, device placement, and an enum to distinguish training versus inference mode.
business_intent: Support rapid development, training, and evaluation of neural TTS models by providing reusable tools for preprocessing, batch manipulation, model output visualization, and experiment tracking, thereby reducing boilerplate and ensuring consistent handling of audio data across the system.
